Class Piece

java.lang.Object
dominio.Piece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IPiece, LPiece, SPiece, SquarePiece, TPiece
public abstract class Piece extends Object implements Serializable
Clase abstracta que representa a las piezas del Tetris
